text: D-216 was one of the most fun places I think in all of IITK. You were a great roommate, though would have been better if you stopped doing a few things. I would always remember the fun that started with playing mini militia and carried to several other games.  Here's to hoping ki tu sudhar jayega.
author: Devansh  Shringi

text: Your dedication to learning in every course is unparalleled, and very inspiring. Thanks for all the discussions and help. Really enjoyed working with you in ACA. Hope to keep meeting you in the future as well.
author: Devansh  Shringi

text: The only Sporting wizard I know, always makes me wonder how can you be so great at everything. Those football matches and discussions will always remain a cherished memory. Always a fun person to talk to and full of enthusiasm. Hope to keep meeting you in the future. wooooooo
author: Devansh  Shringi

text: Really had fun whenever I met you, whether in RM in first sem to every time in the mess. Thanks for the discussions and help in various courses. Hope to remain in contact.
author: Devansh  Shringi

text: Yo TP, always great to have a neighbour like you. Bahut maze kiye playing various things, and discussing weird topics. You were always someone I could go with a problem, thanks for all the help. Hope to keep meeting you in the future. Good luck.
author: Devansh  Shringi

text: Definitely, the person with the best work ethic I know, your hard work and determination to your goal is something I always found inspiring. Thanks for all the discussions and help in various courses, and other fields as well. Hope to keep meeting you . Good luck in the future.
author: Devansh  Shringi

text: I will always remember the great discussions  we had in the mess and canteen, on all possible topics in the world. Hope to keep having them in the future as wel
author: Devansh  Shringi

text: I will miss the discussions we had on football and Superheroes. You were a great friend and your passion for Real Madrid is something I have never seen in anyone else. Hope to meet you soon at one of the World cups.
author: Devansh  Shringi

text: Thanks for all the help in the ESC201 lab, if it weren't for you I would've blown half the lab. Really enjoyed meeting you, though it was always with circuits around for some reason. Hope to keep in touch. Good luck.
author: Devansh  Shringi

text: Definitely, the most drastic change I have ever seen in anyone over the past 4 years. I will always remember all the Gaming nights and the fun we had. Hope to keep meeting you in the future, Dassa boi. Good luck for the future.
author: Devansh  Shringi

text: We had fun in crypto and as ESC101 Tutors, some really memorable moments. Always a nice guy to talk to. Hope we remain in contact. Good luck for the future.
author: Devansh  Shringi

text: It has been amazing knowing and working with you, from assignments to projects. Thanks for the discussions, always had fun. Wished we started doing these earlier. Hope to keep meeting you in the future. Good luck.
author: Devansh  Shringi

text: It was amazing knowing you, still in awe of the dedication of our Magora, be it Athletics or studies. The guy with the cleanest room and who is always helpful. It was fun to having discussions with you on those weird topics. Hope to keep meeting you, party de dunga tab with unlimited dahi. Good luck in the future.
author: Devansh  Shringi

text: Yo Samu, Our friendship goes way longer than IITK, probably the longest friendships ever. Seeing you in the same wing was such a relief. These 4 years added a lot of memories to the list, from gaming to football to volleyball and a lot more. Milte rehna. Good luck.
author: Devansh  Shringi

text: It was great to find someone with very similar interests, the meetings with you were always fun. Thanks for all the discussions and help in various courses. Hope to keep meeting you in future. Good Luck.
author: Devansh  Shringi

text: Definitely, one of the nicest humans I have ever met, and a great friend. Really enjoyed all the joint-study sessions in the numerous courses we had, the chess matches, the football, the weird discussions, help in tutoring students. Didn't enjoy the teasing much though, but I guess it goes both ways. I will keep contact with you, irrespective of if you want to or not. Good Luck in future.
author: Devansh  Shringi

text: Definitely, one of the nicest humans I have ever met, and a great friend. Really enjoyed all the joint-study sessions in the numerous courses we had, the chess matches, the football, the weird discussions, help in tutoring students.  We will remain in contact. Good Luck in future.
author: Devansh  Shringi

text: The amount of hard work you put in at everything you did was always inspiring. Memoir ke liye memories toh bahut jyada hai, copying your TA assignments, NYO IITK intern, saath mein code karna, cards khelna, volleyball aur kabhi kabhi football khelna, aur bhi bahut kuchh. Keep in touch. Good luck in the future.
author: Devansh  Shringi

text: Yo Tanki, bahut kuchh khele aur bahut maze kiye. Thanks for all the sev I ate from your room. Will definitely remember all the fun times and discussions. Hopefully aage bhi kabhi khel lenge. Anyway milte toh rehenge hi. Good luck in the future.
author: Devansh  Shringi

text: yaar tere jitna zinda dil banda nahi dekha, humesha aise hi rehna. It was always great to have a talk with you, irrespective of the topic. Memories toh apni itni hai ki tere favourite song mein memory word nahi hoga utni baar. Milte toh rehna hi. Good luck for the future.
author: Devansh  Shringi
